text: int main ( ) { int n , i , sum , k , a [ 100 ] [ 100 ] , m = 1 , l = 0 , j ; scanf ( "%d" , & k ) ; while ( m <= k ) { scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; for ( i = 0 ; i <= n - 1 ; i ++ ) for ( j = 0 ; j <= i ; j ++ ) scanf ( "%d" , & a [ i ] [ j ] ) ; sum = 0 ; for ( i = 0 ; i <= n - 1 ; i ++ ) for ( j = 0 ; j <= i - i ; j ++ ) { sum = sum + ( max ( a [ i ] [ j ] , a [ i ] [ l + 1 ] ) ) ; if ( a [ i ] [ j ] < a [ i ] [ l + 1 ] ) l ++ ; } printf ( "%d" , sum ) ; m ++ ; } return 0 ; }
